description:
All-purpose, year-round base layer bottoms made with super-soft, 100% pure merino wool, the 175 Everyday Leggings with Fly are perfect for everything from summer nights in camp to frigid days at the ski resort. Featuring icebreaker's 175gm merino rib fabric and a contoured slim fit for smooth layering, soft comfort, and moisture-managing performance, the Everyday Leggings are ready for any active day outside.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Merino 175 Everyday Leggings with Fly - Mens
